column4: I'm confused as to how it can be unable to resolve us.archive.ubuntu.com in the installer but ping on a different console works just fine
try:  echo "nameserver 8.8.8.8" | sudo tee -a /etc/resolv.conf > /dev/null      then retry
thats what the command I gave actually does :)
well, its a different DNS to try
you could add an entry in /etc/hosts for the name to IP conversion if you want
